name: MedClimate
tag_list: health, healthcare, healthcare-it, emr, practice-management, patient-software, patient, electronic-medical-record
overview:
MedClimate is operated by pEMR Health, Inc. Based in Washington, DC., the company aims to provide innovative health solutions to patients, providers and payers in an effort to form a more cohesive relationship in the patient treatment process and increase the quality of care. The risk of error in treatment and level of waste is reduced through the efficiency of the user interface and feature set. Patients can collaborate with multiple providers, request insurance audits, pay their bills, schedule appointments, refill prescriptions and find new providers - all online. With a unique view into their medical record, patients can also learn more about their healthcare condition, see recalls and warnings on prescription medications, manage their physicians, set alerts through text or email and receive their real-time medical info on any device they approve.

The unique relationship of provider and patient offerings means that the patient receives the best possible care while the provider is empowered and can return back to their business. With provider tools such as a fully functional EMR, ePrescriptions, online billing, online scheduling, video conferencing, practice management and patient relationship management, doctors can rest assured that they have everything they need to run their facility. Still not enough? We integrate with the latest technology - from wireless blood pressure cuffs to bluetooth glucometers and ultrasounds. On top of everything, our offerings are cloud-based which means you receive the latest releases of the product for free without having to do anything yourself and you can use your existing infrastructure instead of purchasing-into expensive servers and the latest hardware to get off the ground. Or, let our experts advise you on how to move forward and get your practice moving quickly without spending a fortune.
